thread.title: Free Research Reports on These Credit Services Stocks -- Qiwi, SLM Corp., Synchrony Financial, and Visa

author: cnbc.com
title: Free Research Reports on These Credit Services Stocks -- Qiwi, SLM Corp., Synchrony Financial, and Visa
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on QIWI, SLM, SYF, and V which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Research reports have been issued by WallStEquities.com on Qiwi PLC (NASDAQ: QIWI), SLM Corp. (NASDAQ: SLM), Synchrony Financial (NYSE: SYF), and Visa Inc. (NYSE: V). Credit Services companies originate, acquire, and service loans to individuals and corporations. Their products include student loans, mortgages, lines of credit, private equity, and venture capital. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Qiwi PLC
Nicosia, Cyprus-based Qiwi PLC's stock finished Thursday's session 1.02% lower at $16.52 with a total trading volume of 321,754 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 21.83% over the past year and are trading above their 50-day moving average by 4.19%. The stock has a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 48.85.
On January 29 th , 2018, Qiwi announced that it will hold an extraordinary general meeting of shareholders (the "EGM") on March 06 th , 2018, at 10:00 a.m. Cyprus Time at 12 Kennedy Avenue, Kennedy Business Centre, 2 nd floor, 1087, Nicosia, Cyprus. Only shareholders of record at the close of business on January 29 th , 2018 are entitled to receive notice, attend, and vote at the EGM and any adjourned meeting thereof. Get the full research report on QIWI for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=QIWI
SLM Corp.
Shares in Newark, Delaware headquartered SLM Corp. rose 3.06%, ending yesterday's session at $11.79. A total volume of 5.87 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 3.73 million shares. The stock has gained 3.97% in the past month and 11.33% in the previous three months. The Company's shares are trading 4.00% above their 50-day moving average and 6.56% above their 200-day moving average. Moreover, SLM Corp.'s stock has an RSI of 57.21.
On January 19 th , 2018, research firm B. Riley FBR, Inc. reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the Company's stock with a decrease of the target price from $14 a share to $13 a share.
On January 30 th , 2018, SLM Corp., commonly known as Sallie Mae, announced that Executive Vice President and CFO Steven J. McGarry will speak at the 19 th Annual Credit Suisse Financial Services Forum on February 13 th , 2018, at 3:00 p.m. EST. A live audio webcast and replay, along with presentation slides, will be available at the investor relation page of the Company's website. Find your free research report SLM at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=SLM
Synchrony Financial
On Thursday, Stamford, Connecticut headquartered Synchrony Financial's stock saw a slight decline of 0.05%, to close the day at $39.66. A total volume of 5.44 million shares was traded. The Company's shares have advanced 2.06% in the last month, 21.58% in the previous three months, and 10.17% over the past year. The stock is trading 5.04% and 23.92% above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages, respectively. Additionally, shares of Synchrony Financial, which operates as a consumer financial services company in the US, have an RSI of 57.65.
On January 09 th , 2018, research firm Wells Fargo upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Market Perform' to 'Outperform'.
On January 23 rd , 2018, Synchrony Financial announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.15 per share of common stock, payable on February 15 th , 2018, to holders of record at the close of business on February 05 th , 2018. Sign up today for the free research report on SYF at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=SYF
Visa
Shares in San Francisco, California headquartered Visa Inc. ended the day 1.20% higher at $125.72. A total volume of 11.10 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 7.53 million shares. The stock has gained 9.79% in the last month, 14.31% in the previous three months, and 52.50% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 8.47% and 20.58%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Visa have an RSI of 71.66.
On January 14 th , 2018, Visa announced that its suite of sensory branding is now available as a pilot program for merchants, terminal manufacturers, and developers. The Company's unique sound, animation, and haptic (vibration) cues signify completed, secure transactions in digital and physical retail environments when consumers pay using Visa. Covering approximately 60% of the US merchant point-of-sale terminal market, manufacturers Equinox Payments, Ingenico Group, Poynt, and Verifone are working with Visa to pilot sensory branding with merchant partners in the coming year.
On January 29 th , 2018, research firm Citigroup reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the Company's stock with an increase of the target price from $136 a share to $145 a share. Wall St. Equities' research coverage also includes the downloadable free report on V at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=V
--
